name: Lemon Jeffery
description: Lemon Jeffery by Irie Genetics was created when Irie Jeff blended his Golden Goat male with a favorite Lemon Skunk female. Irie Jeff bred these strains together to improve Lemon Skunk’s lanky structure while preserving the strain’s distinct lemon candy flavor. Lemon Jeffery can reach into the mid-20% THC range, and can produce a heavy yield if given the space to grow. This strain has an approximate flowering time of 70 days.
